import { useState, useCallback, useRef } from 'react' import { append, update, filter } from 'ramda' // import gradient from 'gradient-color' import { v4 as uuid } from 'uuid' import './App.css' import TodoList from './TodoList' function App() { // // commonjs style // const gradient = require('gradient-color') // // module import style // // import gradient from 'gradient-color' // // const colors = gradient([ // '#E5404C', // '#FD743C', // '#FD9C3C' // ], 20) // // // array of 20 colors in `rgb(x, x, x)` format // console.log(colors) const inputRef = useRef() const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('') const [todos, setTodos] = useState([]) const handleSubmit = useCallback((e) => { e.preventDefault() e.stopPropagation() setInputValue('') inputRef.current.focus() setTodos(append({ key: uuid(), title: inputValue, archived: false, })) }, [inputValue]) return
setInputValue(e.target.value) } placeholder={'Enter todo'} />
setTodos(update(index, item)) } />
} export default App
